title: Cafe Citoyen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic bistro offering vegan choices and keeps on hand soymilk. Located in the city center between the large pedestrian street (Rue de Bethune) and Rue du Molinel, next to the Museum of Fine Arts and the Prefecture. Has a little stage for acoustic concert.
streetAddress: 7, place du Vieux Marche aux Chevaux
